title: Pelosi Vs. Progress, Life In An Amazon Town 9.30.21
itunes:title: Pelosi Vs. Progress, Life In An Amazon Town 9.30.21
description:
In episode 999, Jack and Miles are joined by host of the Ridiculous Romance Podcast Diana Banks to discuss the how progressives won't budge, YouTube FINALLY banning vaccine misinformation? Amazons company times, Halloween candies by state and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Progressives Won't Budge
  2. Oh wow, YouTube FINALLY banning vaccine misinformation?
  3. Amazon Can Fuck Right Off With These Company Towns
  4. Most popular Halloween candies by state
  5. St. Panther - Problems
